sentences.en: "You seem tired this morning, Jenny," she said kindly.
sentences.cn: “你今天早上看上去很累，珍妮，”她关切地说。

sentences.en: A kindly twinkle came into her eyes.
sentences.cn: 她的目光变得友善起来。

sentences.en: A veiled woman gave me a kindly smile.
sentences.cn: 一位戴面纱的女士朝我友好地微笑。

sentences.en: He doesn't take kindly to suggestions that he is over the hill.
sentences.cn: 他不爱听别人说他风光不再。

sentences.en: He had very kindly asked me to the cocktail party that evening.
sentences.cn: 他很客气地邀请我参加那晚的鸡尾酒会。

sentences.en: He kindly carried our picnic in a rucksack.
sentences.cn: 他很体贴地背着装有我们野餐食物的背包。

sentences.en: He was a stern critic but an extremely kindly man.
sentences.cn: 他是个苛刻的批评家，但却是个非常善良的人。

sentences.en: Her neighbours spoke of her as kindly and hospitable.
sentences.cn: 她的邻居都说她和蔼可亲、热情好客.

sentences.en: It is hard to imagine her taking kindly to too much interference.
sentences.cn: 很难想象她会喜欢被人过多地干涉。

sentences.en: It is hoped that the readers will kindly point out our errors.
She did not take kindly to being offered advice.
sentences.cn: 她不喜欢别人给她提建议。

sentences.en: She kindly offered to go and fetch him some beer.
sentences.cn: 她体贴地主动去给他拿了些啤酒来。

sentences.en: Will you kindly give me a receipt for it?
sentences.cn: 请给我开一张回执好 吗 ?

sentences.en: Will you kindly obey the instructions I am about to give?
sentences.cn: 劳驾你服从我要给出的指令好不好？

sentences.en: Would you kindly show me the way to the station?
sentences.cn: 你可以指点我去车站的路 吗 ?

words.tran_cn: 和蔼的；宽容的；令人感激的
亲切的；和蔼的；体贴的；爽快的

phrases.tran_cn: 不欢迎，不被（某人，物）喜欢

trans.tran_cn: 厚道的，亲切的，温和的，宜人的，〈古〉自然的
trans.tran_en: kind and caring for other people

trans.tran_cn: 亲切地，友好地，诚恳地，衷心地，（用作请求时的礼貌用语或把命令说成请求的反语）请
